# top

**Type Property**

Scroll so that the item is positioned at the top of the collection view’s bounds.

## Declaration

```swift
static var top: UICollectionView.ScrollPosition { get }
```

## Discussion

This option is mutually exclusive with the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionView/ScrollPosition/centeredVertically] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionView/ScrollPosition/bottom] options.

## Constants

- **centeredVertically**: Scroll so that the item is centered vertically in the collection view.
- **bottom**: Scroll so that the item is positioned at the bottom of the collection view’s bounds.
- **left**: Scroll so that the item is positioned at the left edge of the collection view’s bounds.
- **centeredHorizontally**: Scroll so that the item is centered horizontally in the collection view.
- **right**: Scroll so that the item is positioned at the right edge of the collection view’s bounds.
